      AIOperation processAttack(AIController api)
      This Ocelot will attack the largest thread at its borders first.
      AIOperation processFortify(AIController api)
      This Ocelot will move all its units to the country that it can use to attack the most neighbouring countries.
      AIOperation processReinforce(AIController api)
      This Ocelot will reinforce all its countries that border with hostile countries based on the size of the enemy armies at those countries.

      • defineFrontline

        private void defineFrontline(AIController api,
                             java.util.Set<Country> internal,
                             java.util.Map<Country,java.lang.Integer> frontline)
        Iterates through each Country on the ModelBoard and adds the Countrys that border enemy Countrys to 'frontline' and Countrys that border NO enemy Countrys to 'internal'.
        Parameters:
        api - AIController The AIControllor for interaction.
        internal - Set of countries bordering no enemies.
        frontline - Set of countries bordering enemies.
